  • Testing Throughout the Project Lifecycle

    Understanding test activities

    ...title...

    This course is about the testing activities that occur in the various project phases of the PPMO and describes the different test levels and test types that can occur. Our goal was to help users:

    Understand the test activities that occur at each project phase

    Recognize the V-Model and how testing is integrated throughout the project lifecycle

    Compare theÂ four test levels' objectives, targets and types of defects they identify

    Compare the four test types

    Understand the reasons for implementing maintenance testing

    hmm...
